title: PSA to People Who Play Thresh and Can't Last Hit
body:
The execution for Relic Shield is only for melee champs. If you can't last hit minions don't even bother buying Relic Shield and consider grabbing Ancient Coin instead to save both you and your ADC some gold.

As an ADC main, it's so annoying to leave Siege Minion to your Thresh and have him miss it all the time. Once in a while is forgivable, because nobody's perfect, but when you're just sitting there trying to last hit every single minion (awfully, I might add), not only does it push the wave and make us more vulnerable to ganks, we get so little gold from it.

Sorry, just getting tired of Threshes doing this.

replies.body: I've been using the newer version of Ancient Coin/Talisman on Thresh lately, feels much more satisfying on him than it used to be with the passive heal. Plus it gives you some bulk now, so you're not left with your pants down.
With the massive buff to talisman of Ascension and Thresh's naturally synergy with engage items, I was surprised that the item didn't become core on him instantly.
That armour on Talisman and the Raptor Cloak speed buff gives you so much more flexibility now :O
yeap rn for thresh coin>relic
Blame Riot for putting idiotic suggested items.
But Thresh is an engage support like Leo and Naut, and relic shield helps them.

Talisman of Ascension could also help with engage, with it's 40% Movement Speed boost to allies.

Threshes build Face of the Mountain/Eye of the Equinox mainly for it's health bonus and its shield, not for engage. I think Ancient Coin and its respective items are a little underrated, even after their buffs in 6.14. :(
I used it to be in the front line but also peel for my ADC with the shield

The good thing is that there are 2 things you do to help increase your last hitting to proc the relic.
1. Take AD marks! It's actually used a lot to help.
2. Just let your flay passive fill up, it's nice :)

I got out of Bronze last season as Thresh by taking my AD runes (only 2 rune pages at the time), maxing E, and taking ignite and I would literally just auto attack the enemy ADC to death because they weren't paying attention or something.

Every once in a while I would get those ADCs that would constantly complain about "ks" even though they didn't even realize I was attacking the enemy because they tunnel vision on cs. God I hated Bronze
bronze is fun, tho.  You can play whatever you want, and still get fed.

Speaking from the other viewpoint, its annoying as a Thresh player when your ADC just doesn't acknowledge your need to last hit some minions for relic shield, thus forcing the Thresh to try and do it too quickly which usually results in missed cs.

omfg its not just frustrating for you thresh players but also for {{champion:89}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:201}} who NEED to get relic shield.

so stupid when all those jhins last hit siege minion right before me while im 160 units away from it.

I agree with this, especially in silver gold tier where your adc just mindlessly autos when you have a relic proc up. You have to beat both your minions and your adc to the last hit and that's often difficult when you do 50 per auto because you used flay to poke like a good boy. PSA: let the minions chunk the health down and don't leave the caddy at an awkward health percentage while you're in Lane with thresh.

Also, if you're an adc saving cannon for your support, check that they have relic shield procs left. Too many times i've had an adc leave me cannon and rage uncontrollably for the next 30 min because they can't be bothered to check for glowing orbs that tell them how many procs are left.

As a Thresh main myself, the mere fact that so many threshes make such a mistake really grinds my gears.

The tooltip for relic shield CLEARLY specifies the execute is for melee champs, so the fact that people freaking go to the report a bug section to say relic won't execute as thresh (people actually do that, its freaking sad actually) blows my mind, but not in a good way. 

Thank you for making this post, raising awareness for this fact is much needed, somehow...

Legit do people not get that Thresh is ranged or something?????

The fact so many threshes make this mistake makes me furious. Heck, I just got out of bronze recently but even when I was bronze V I knew this shit. So if I, a former bronze, know about this, then other people who are also bronze have no excuse for SOMEHOW not knowing about this.

TLDR, this PSA is really useful, and I thank you for that, as the mere fact people make such a mistake annoys me. 


I hope whoever reads this has a great day! :D Best of luck on the rift! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Thanks :D you made my day ~

As a support that tried thresh a couple times:

Physical damage marks.  Your adc needs the gold and you need to give it to them, or let them take it for themselves. Don't miss!  Missing is expensive!!

Max your flay ability first-- it increases your on-hit passive damage per rank.

Don't use your autoattack to lower it's health.  let the minions (and ADC if necessary) do that!  The on-hit damage from Flay is reduced to your base damage every time you use an autoattack, and slowly regenerates to full power.

I hope this helps some thresh-to-bes out there!
And if that doesn't convince you, {{item:3069}} makes you float when you use the active =)
Just common sense, really.

That's a separate issue entirely. Relic shield is by no means a bad item on Thresh, but if you miss last hits, since it doesn't offer ranged auto-attackers(ie Thresh) execute dmg, people can easily screw it up, in which case the wave can push, or the cs can simply not go to anyone, making it a much better scenario if the Thresh buys an Ancient Coin, since it doesn't require you to be able to last hit. This only applies to people who are inconsistent when last hitting with Thresh.

PSA to adcs while I'm playing thresh with relic shield: please stop making me fight you for cs

Half the reason I miss is because I have to fight my adc to get any form of cs. I used to go coin because yes in a lot of situations it's better but in general this meta is not good for squishy threshs, and relic shield let's me survive longer. 

...but yes I do suck at csing too. :(

An adc main that lets relic supports hit the siege minion! Supports are rare but you are a myth that shares a table with Zeus atop Mt. Olympus for breakfast right before you pay respects to your old friend Hades in the Underworld before hitting the rift to deal out death.

I'm a thresh main this season, and I know exactly what you mean. I began a habit of keeping that cannon minions health bar open just to make sure I execute it right. I do miss it sometimes, but I have to also make sure my E's passive is fully loaded.
Coin is perfectly acceptable if the Thresh player can shield his ADC on trades. That way you don't even need the heal from Relic.

I'm guessing a number of Threshes aren't aware of or aren't thinking about their Flay passive damage. When there's a siege minion coming up, I try not to AA so that I can get a safer last hit with the extra passive damage. I see a lot of Threshes just keep throwing AA's in the lead up to their relic pop and then miss it like 50% of the time.

PSA: If you're getting Relic Shield on Thresh, FOR THE LOVE OF GOD TAKE FLAY AT LEVEL ONE!

The only time where it's ok to take hook instead of flay at lvl one on Thresh is when you're invading/getting invaded very early on.
